talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL>I'll do my best to honor King Sidon,
today and always!
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Prince Sidon is finally king! And the lovely
Queen Yona looks so royal!

And guess what?! Just like that...<sp:5:1:0> Ta-da!


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>The <clr:0000>Prince Sidon<clr:ffff> fan club is now<sp:5:0:0> the
<clr:0000>KING Sidon<clr:ffff> fan club!

<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_01>Things change, but one thing that seems
set to stay is my brother's appetite.<sp:5:0:0>
Really, how much crab can one Zora eat?
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Unconscious>This sludge...<sp:5:1:0> It makes me feel so
gross.<sp:5:1:0> Urp!
talk0007: <sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Unconscious>Argh...<sp:5:1:0> Ughhh...<sp:5:1:0> This sludge...<sp:5:1:0> I hate it!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey! <sp:5:0:0>You're the guy who helped our dear
King Sidon save the domain!<sp:5:1:0> Right?

<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think_00>I was covered in that gross sludge, and so
I was resting a lot. All I can say is that it
was TERRIBLE!
Just thinking about it makes me...<sp:5:1:0> Urp!<sp:5:0:0>
Ugh, excuse me. That's the effect of the
sludge, you see.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Thank you for saving the...<sp:5:0:0> URP!<sp:5:0:0> Ahem.
By that I mean the domain!
talk0008: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Thank you for saving the domain!<sp:5:0:0> Urp!
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>If King Sidon and Queen Yona have a
baby...that little Zora is sure to be
beyond adorable!
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Ease>Just imagine, the child of two Zora that I
completely adore...<sp:5:0:0> *siiigh* How lovely!
